appDesc.message: Live new tab page: customize clocks, to-do list, hundreds of living photos in your browser.

auth_banner_passcode_text.message: with a Passcode from unwanted viewers!

auth_bottom_text.message: Get LiveStartPage Premium account to unlock great features. Early access to new Premium Features and new custom Live Wallpapers!

auth_d_come_back.message: Then come back and try again

auth_password_is_required_min_8.message: Password must be at least 8 characters

auth_premium_pricing_ru.message: 50 ROUBLE per month OR 500 ROUBLE per year

auth_protect.message: Protect your data with a Passcode from unwanted viewers!

auth_protect_help.message: Bookmark tiles, tasks, and other information should belong only to you. No one should have access to your data. Set a password for your Live Start Page (LSP) and LOCK your extension. Nobody will be able to access besides you.

auth_synchronize_dials_help.message: Don't lose your Bookmarks! You can synchronize groups and dials (bookmark tiles) between browsers and computers. For example, when you add a new dial in Chrome, you will get it on Firefox or a different computer.

auth_synchronize_tasks_help.message: Achieve your goals with the task lists. By using synchronization, you can access your tasks any time from any computer that has LSP installed.

auth_trial_activated.message: Your 14 days of Free Trial are activated

auth_trial_will_expire.message: Trial will expire in N days

auth_you_agree.message: By clicking “Sign up”, you agree to our

options_relax_popup_body_bottom_text_1.message: Get your daily dose of mindfulness. Relax your mind and regain focus.

options_relax_popup_body_bottom_text_2.message: To achieve best results, we recommend meditating twice a day. In the morning and in the evening for 15-20 minutes.You can choose simple meditation like sounds of nature or use meditation sessions recorded by professionals.

welcome_slide_1_2.message: Place where you become productive, meditate to regain focus or just enjoy beautiful backgrounds

welcome_slide_2_1.message: Meditate to Relax and Regain Focus

welcome_slide_3_2.message: Quickly access your favorite websites with the Speed Dial.

welcome_slide_3_3.message: Organize in beautiful tiles and groups.

welcome_slide_3_hint_1.message: Widget with visual bookmarks (your most favorite and frequently visited sites).

welcome_slide_3_hint_2.message: You can categorize websites by theme into groups like Recipes, Cinema, Health etc. Every site is a separate tile containing a site name, a link and a special preview picture that will help you locate the needed site amongst others.

welcome_slide_3_hint_3.message: You can also add your own background to such sites or select a nice theme from the ones available.

welcome_slide_4_1.message: Extra to be Productive and Focused

welcome_slide_4_1_0.message: ...and some extra to be productive and focused

welcome_slide_4_1_1.message: Please note, you can configure all these options later in the LiveStartPage settings

welcome_slide_5_1_1.message: Hundreds of Live and Static Wallpapers for you!

welcome_slide_clock_hint_2.message: Choose from the big variety of digital clocks. Set color, style, time format etc.

welcome_slide_focus_hint_2.message: Set your priorities right! Focus on your highest priorities during the day.

welcome_slide_relax_hint_2.message: Meditation mode will let you forget about everything happening around and truly relax. Let your mind wander. Relax and restore your concentration power.

welcome_slide_todo_hint_2.message: With our to-do list you will never miss a single event. Stay on top of everything!

welcome_slide_weather_hint_2.message: Weather forecast for your city and any location in the world. Auto search for your location, view temperature in Celsius and Fahrenheit.
